That said, the room is fully furnished and the apartment is well furnished too.
The apartment is located near Fordham University and Pelham Parkway stop on the #2 subway, about 40 minutes from Midtown Manhattan. Beautiful Area, easy commute.

One room for rent in a 3 bedroom, 2 bath apt in LIC. It is a 31 story high rise along the water and you will be on the 26th floor. Amazing view (see pic) and two awesome roommates. Our third roomie just got his masters and needs to move away for work. If you are a low-key, ambitious individual who can keep to himself but also knows how to get down, I think you found the right place;).
AMENITIES:
-built in a/c and heater in your room. WHAT?!
-gym in the building at no extra charge and a lap pool across the street (if you so choose) at an extra $50/mo.
-laundry on every floor.
-dishwasher IN the apartment.
-24hr doorman
-super pet friendly building/neighborhood (we have one dog in the house. super quiet. doesn`t bark.)
-free shuttle that takes you to the 7 train (but the station is so close it`s a little ridiculous)
-one subway stop away from Manhattan
-you can also mix it up and take the ferry. It`s only 2 blocks away!
-grocery store, drug store, restaurants, and liquor store right downstairs
-also right downstairs: track, soccer field, volleyball field, dog park, playground, library, parking garage, etc etc etc
-lounge in lobby with pool table, full kitchen, tv, free wi-fi for working, etc
-awesome building rooftop access complete with lounge chairs
-3rd largest climbing gym just opened up a few blocks away.
-close to 7, G, E, M, N, Q, and R trains.
TO MOVE IN:
-commit to 14mos beginning 8/1/14 (2mo sublet for roomie moving out + 1yr lease with me and the other guy after)
-1 month security deposit (may be adjusted depending on total apt rent when the three of us renew our lease in Oct)*
-1/3 cable bill + 1/3 electric bill each month
*note that rent may increase when the lease is renewed. We will distribute it fairly between the three tenants.
YOUR ROOMMATES:
1) 28yo male, MBA, Citibank finance, smart, quiet, keeps to himself most of the time but also down to have a good time
2) 29yo female in shoe design/production, triathlete, also keeps a very busy schedule but when around is down to hang out and do whatever
We are very chill and easy. Our schedules usually prevent us from having much interaction (ideally that`s you too) but when we are around, we are very easy going and sociable and will be happy to all hang out if you so choose.

Ideally I would like to live in a place that has a yard for my dog and two parking spots for me: one for my camper and one for my daily commuter. If you or anyone you know has an RV space with hookups for rent in North Lake Tahoe please get in contact with me as I am looking to secure this type of housing situation ASAP. Our big back yard garden is unfenced and linked directly to Lost Lake Park. Biking, Walking, Swimming, Relaxing among the trees. We are plunk-dab in the woods with only fir trees for neighbors behind us...
Our spot has minimal traffic because it`s not connected by through road to the village...only bikes and walkers. Nice and Quiet.
Our home has a master bedroom, with private deck and private bathroom. Our quick iphone pics don`t quite describe its size or beauty. Vaulted ceilings, lots of light. Amazing clawfoot cast iron bathtub, heated floors, forest views.
We also have a second, nautically themed bedroom with two single beds (that can come together to make a huge bed)
We have several nooks around the house that might appeal to extra guests ...but our primary aim is to bring a small group of yoga enthusiasts to test-drive the house as a venue for future yoga minded events.

Two fireplaces, three bathrooms, wifi internet, complete office, dining room, full capability kitchen, big sun decks, parking.

One room for rent in a 3 bedroom, 2 bath apt in LIC. It is a 31 story high rise along the water and you will be on the 26th floor. Amazing view (see pic) and two awesome roommates. Our third roomie just got his masters and needs to move away for work. If you are a low-key, ambitious individual who can keep to himself but also knows how to get down, I think you found the right place;).
AMENITIES:
-built in a/c and heater in your room. WHAT?!
-gym in the building at no extra charge and a lap pool across the street (if you so choose) at an extra $50/mo.
-laundry on every floor.
-dishwasher IN the apartment.
-24hr doorman
-super pet friendly building/neighborhood (we have one dog in the house. super quiet. doesn`t bark.)
-free shuttle that takes you to the 7 train (but the station is so close it`s a little ridiculous)
-one subway stop away from Manhattan
-you can also mix it up and take the ferry. It`s only 2 blocks away!
-grocery store, drug store, restaurants, and liquor store right downstairs
-also right downstairs: track, soccer field, volleyball field, dog park, playground, library, parking garage, etc etc etc
-lounge in lobby with pool table, full kitchen, tv, free wi-fi for working, etc
-awesome building rooftop access complete with lounge chairs
-3rd largest climbing gym just opened up a few blocks away.
-close to 7, G, E, M, N, Q, and R trains.
TO MOVE IN:
-commit to 14mos beginning 8/1/14 (2mo sublet for roomie moving out + 1yr lease with me and the other guy after)
-1 month security deposit (may be adjusted depending on total apt rent when the three of us renew our lease in Oct)*
-1/3 cable bill + 1/3 electric bill each month
*note that rent may increase when the lease is renewed. We will distribute it fairly between the three tenants.
YOUR ROOMMATES:
1) 28yo guy, MBA, Citibank finance, smart, quiet, keeps to himself most of the time but also down to have a good time
2) 29yo girl in shoe design/production, triathlete, also keeps a very busy schedule but when around is down to hang out and do whatever
We are very chill and easy. Our schedules usually prevent us from having much interaction (ideally that`s you too) but when we are around, we are very easy going and sociable and will be happy to all hang out if you so choose.
TEXT ME AT ANY TIME OF DAY OR NIGHT AT 845-505-0231 if interested. My schedule is pretty flexible this week and I should be able to show you the place within relatively short notice. THANKS!!!

postings.body:
Next Opening... AUGUST 2014
Are you relocating to the area for college, recent graduate first job, military assignment or even Boeing?
Interested in living really nice in modern contemporary house designed for cool people that share the same interest? Well.... the Ultimate Roommate Pad might be what you`re looking for. Don`t let the name fool you it`s not just a room, however a way of life. Cool People who take pride in working hard and living nicely. This Pad was created to bring young professionals together who want to live nicely while having the time of their life. If you`re not familiar with the phrase Work Hard, Play Harder or you`re not so interested in making friends with new people in a new city then this might NOT be for you...
Many folks move to a new city with struggles of finding the social crowd or that first real friend. The concept was created by young professionals and service members for young professionals and service members. We`re not some couple with a spare room or someone who needs help paying the bills. We felt so many people young professionals were moving the Charleston with same situation and common interest so we created the Ultimate Roommate Pad. Our house offers more than a room, however an experience.
The Ultimate Roommate Pad is completely furnished with all modern Grade A furnishing. The house is over 2900 sq. ft with 5 bedroom and 3.5 bathroom. All rooms have been furnished with Rooms To Go furnishing. All rooms have queen size bed, nightstand(s) and desk. Kitchen has all stainless steel appliances. The house features a mini Sportz Lounge that showcases a mahogany custom built 9 ft pool table, 55 in. sports television, indoor grill and a mini bar to entertain your friends and/or relatives. The patio has custom built furniture and gas grill... The patio is definitely a social haven for our popular Wingz Night... cooking up some of the best HOT wings or roasting oysters, light the tiki`s candles and this is the ideal place to relax and chill with friends.
The Ultimate Roommate Pad concept creates a hassle free environment. Starting off with rent options - pay $595 or a FLAT rate which includes ALL bills and utilities...so no matter who moves in or out of the Roommate Pad the rate never changes for the duration of your lease. This is a very popular way to go for budgeting and security. If you thought that was cool, the house features a program call "No Worry" Supplies, this program purchases all the common house supplies like paper goods, trash bags cleaning agents and more. You will never hear someone say we`re out of bathroom tissue. The roommates plan weekend trips, club nights, camping trips, beach day, concert weekends and even happy hour evenings. Most people enter as roommates and leave as friends! Hopefully you can SEE why.
The Roommate Pad concept has been going strong for 5 years.... housing over 12 Navy Guys, 10 Air Force, 5 Coast Guard, 8 Marines, 10 CSU/Trident student and 4 Citadels cadets and at over 10 roommates from various professions like Boeing and Bosch. We must say The Roommate Pad is more than just a place to stay, but an experience. The house was created with purpose so it has structure and personality. The Ultimate Roommate Pad is definitely not a John Doe who has a spare room. We take pride in making sure all roommates are a good fit to ensure a quality experience at the house. Everyone HERE has one common goal to like nicely with other people who are excited about meeting new people while having an AWESOME TIME in South Carolina. If you`re interested shoot us e-mail include a detailed info about yourself, photo and length of lease your interested in. Don`t forget to answer 2 important questions- Why do you this house fits you? and What can you contribute to the The Roommate Pad.
If you`re local we can set-up a house tour asap... Our process takes a little time, however you will appreciate it later!
If you`re interested... shoot us an email... if you`re local we can set-up a house tour asap.

postings.body:
House, 4 Bedrooms + Detached Unit, 3.5 Baths, (Sleeps 8-10)
Enjoy the peace and quiet of this luxury home called `Edgewater` perched on the banks of Ginguite Inlet in the town of Southern Shores. This 4,800 sq. ft. property features two detached dwellings which are both included in the one rental fee. The main house has three bedrooms (each with its own separate loft area), gourmet kitchen, game room, and more. The guest house features one bedroom, a loft, and separate kitchen. Wide decks surround the property, offering expansive views of the landscape. This configuration is ideal for families who want to vacation together but still enjoy their own privacy.
During your stay you will have full access to the town`s community beaches. Ride your bike or drive the short distance over. The rental packet includes parking passes good for use at Hillcrest Lifeguard Beach, among other spots. Also included are keys to the community tennis courts. And for boaters, you`ll have privileges to use the Southern Shores Boat Club. Facilities include a boat launch for getting in. Then simply head over to Edgewater and the 24 ft. dock at the end of our pier.
The house is conveniently located just over the Wright Memorial Bridge as you enter the Outer Banks from Route 158. This convenient location means you won`t need to fight traffic on your way in or out. Once you reach the Outer Banks, you`re pretty much there!
As the photographs show, Edgewater is not your typical `beach box` destination. Vistors experience the best of both worlds: Easy access to the beach and restaurants and shops, combined with the tranquility and natural beauty of the coastline against the backdrop of Kitty Hawk Woods. Watch the sunset over the marsh grass. Listen to the frogs sing. There`s something to be said for open, undeveloped spaces. Soundside sanctuary. Edgewater is that.
If you`d rather, you can access the property from the water. We`re just off the inter-coastal waterway on Albemarle Sound. The house has a dock measuring 12 x 24 ft. with sturdy mooring pilings and a wide pier leading to the house. The depth of the water is approximately 3 ft. at the shallowest. The channel is much deeper. Or bring your kayak or canoe and create your own adventure.
Here`s a brief walking tour of the property:
When you walk in the front door you are met by the vaulted ceilings of the spacious great room, featuring enormous cross beams which were salvaged from an old Pennsylvania barn. The gourmet kitchen is here, with its granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. You`ll notice the cabinets are made of wormy chestnut, an expensive wood which helps set the tone for the rest of the house. There`s a dining table for eight, as well as bar stools at the kitchen counter for five more. The living room area has brown leather sofas and comfortable side chairs, arranged around a 52-inch flat screen T.V. with home theater surround sound. Edgewater is a `smart home` and so you will also find WiFi, televisions, and stereo speakers you can control throughout the two houses.
Leaving the kitchen area there is a long hallway with three bedrooms and a separate half bath closer to the kitchen. Each bedroom has its own loft with either sleeper sofas or fold out beds. And the water views from each loft are incredible! The first bedroom on your left as you walk down the hall away from the kitchen features a pyramid bunk. This bedroom has shared access to a large bathroom, which adjoins the second bedroom on your left. The second bedroom offers a queen-sized bed. At the end of the hall overlooking the water view is the main house master bedroom, with king-sized bed and deluxe master bathroom.
Walking out onto the deck from the main house, you find the large hot tub facing the water. To your right, on the same level, you enter the separate guest house dwelling. Through the front door of the detached home, you can go either right or left. To the right is the living room and full kitchen, with spiral stairs leading up to the loft. Windows throughout the house face the water and the marsh, giving the feeling that you`re floating in the nature space. Continue to the left, to the other side of the house, and you find the master bedroom with its king-sized bed and comfortable seating by the windows. The master bath is accessible from both the bedroom and the living room area.
On the ground floor is the in-ground concrete pool. Please note that during late fall/winter the pool is closed for the season. Next to the pool you will find the tiki bar and outdoor grill. All is within easy reach of the game room, which boasts a pool table, television, wet bar, and more. There`s plenty of parking, both covered and not. In fact, there`s a two-bay garage at your disposal. Off the parking area behind the house is the long, wide wooden pier leading through the marsh area to the dock. This pier is a wonderful spot for enjoying sunsets and the natural beauty of the Nature Conservancy preserve.
Keywords: beach house, vacation rental, coast, outer banks, holiday, family, kid friendly, reunion, wedding, retreat, boat dock, waterfront, hot tub, wifi

postings.body:
Welcome to Your Downtown Getaway! We have 2 beautifully furnished apartments in the Heart of Downtown Vancouver for short term stays. Both our suites are fully equipped and conveniently located. We cater to corporate clients, business or pleasure travelers, families, people who wish to relocate to Vancouver, or home sellers who require a transition home between selling and buying.
All of our suites have all the comforts and amenities to make you feel right at home.
To view our properties and availability, or to contact us, please click bellow:
http://www.vrbo.com/409313
http://www.vrbo.com/436846
Our apartaments are newly renovated in a charming and luxurious way. A lovely view of English Bay or Downtown Vancouver it is a perfect location for you to enjoy! From our Downtown buildings you can walk to some of the most exciting places Vancouver has to offer. This premium location in the heart of downtown Vancouver just accross the Law Courts is just minutes from world-class shopping and dining in Yaletown, Gastown and Robson Street and close to BC Place, the Vancouver Art Gallery, the Queen Elizabeth Theatre and the Orpheum Theatre.
Here is a sneak preview:
- Just a 5 minute from the city`s most vibrant shopping area, Robson Street;
-Just under the building you can find movie theaters, YMCA, Grocery Store and restaurants
- A 15 minute walk to the Acquabus Ferries that take you across to Granville Island (a must see!), where you can visit the public market, listen to live music, eat some great food or simply stroll and view all the beautiful items made by our local artists;
- A 15 minute walk to trendy Yaletown, which has some great restaurants and boutique stores;
- Three blocks away from the Vancouver Art Gallery;
- A 20 minute walk to beautiful Stanley Park;
- A 5 minute walk to a skytrain station so you can get anywhere in the city, including the Vancouver International Airport;
- And for those travelling on business, we are within walking distance of the Vancouver Convention and Exhibition Centre and BC Place.
Our apartment is fully furnished and has broad 9 ft. windows, providing great views of the Downtown area and plenty of daylight. The bedroom has a walk-in closet where you can store your suitcases . In the bedroom there is a queen size bed and both apartaments have a separate sleeping area that can comfortably acomodate up to 3 people. An open style kitchen gives the place a very comfortable and open feel.
All (like new!) linens, towels, hair dryer, iron and all kitchen accessories are just a few of the many items provided for our guests.
Vancouver, like many places in the world is getting warmer each year, so even though you wouldn`t think airconditioning is necessary in a Canadian city, don`t be fooled! It gets very hot specially as windows that open are typically very small.
One of the few air conditioned properties in downtown Vancouver
Other features include:
- Underground Parking available
- LCD TV and DVD Player
- Cable television
- Free central air conditioning and heating
- Free High-speed wireless internet
- Free laundry
- Free local phone calls
- BBQ
- Gym.
- 3 high speed elevators.
- pool table, ping pong table, theatre room and sauna.*
Why stay in a hotel, when you can enjoy your own condo centrally located in the heart of downtown Vancouver!
We look forward to having you stay with us!
Interested? Got a question? Contact me here
http://www.vrbo.com/409313 or http://www.vrbo.com/436846

postings.body:
My very nice roommate has gotten engaged and now he wants to live with his fiancee instead of me, which I suppose is rational. Anyway, it means I need a NEW roommate. Move in would be early August.
Details:
500 William St, (second floor) OAKLAND CA
The apartment is part of the Uptown, which is a very lovely, very urban place. It has nice things like a gym, pool usually full of happy kids, hot tub, theater room, lovely courtyards with grills, off-the-grid out front every Monday night, etc.
2 bedrooms, 2 baths, 2 walk-in closets, Dishwasher, in-unit washer and dryer, tons of natural light (for example, your bedroom has french doors leading onto a micro-balcony looking over a park and the Fox theater)
1/2 block from Transbay bus NL, 1/1R/18, etc. 1 block from 19th street BART, 3 blocks from highway.
Your Rent = $1350/month plus normal utilities (internet, electricity, trash). If you want a secure parking spot in the garage underneath it`s $75/month.
I will consider a cat. If it`s nice and if you vacuum obsessively to help my allergies. Dogs aren`t allowed in this building, alas.
Me:
I am 30 year-old woman, I work in SF but love Oakland. I`m finishing up a PhD at Berkeley and running a start-up in San Francisco that works on transportation analytics to help cities and planners and businesses incorporate transportation into their decisions and thus reduce driving and all its greenhouse impacts. Generally, I`m at out of the apartment 8-6 on weekdays.
My friends are great. I like to have them over for dinner parties.
I cook a lot. I volunteer with a couple Oakland organizations. I read. I run. I am almost always willing to go grab a drink and talk about arts or politics or gossip.
I`m am reasonably tidy, but not obsessively so.
I travel for work and fun a fair amount--at least once a month.
You:
I`m looking for a roommate (just one person) who is sociable and wants the apartment to be a place where bookclubs and friends and conversations come together and happen. Age, gender, sexuality--anything goes.
Some pictures:
Kitchen full and empty. My room (yours is bigger but right now it`s empty so the picture was boring). Your french windows. Apartment layout.

postings.body:
Hello Potential Roommate!
Are you looking for a last minute deal on an awesome place? Then I have the place for you! I have two rooms available, one available now and the other available September 1st! Both rooms are awesome in a place that has off-street parking, washer and dryer, renovated kitchen, dishwasher and garbage disposal, backyard with fire pit, 4/20 friendly, five minute walk to the 66, 86, and 70 line, stone throw away from Harvard Square, Central Square, and Brighton, and rooming with music enthusiasts!
The Place
------------
The place is a 5 person home sharing 2 bathrooms both with showers, (see tenants below). The unit includes it`s own driveway for you to park your car, and only has two tenants thus far that have cars to park at the unit. We are located across from an elementary school, so our street and surrounding streets do not require permit parking. If your friends wish to visit, they can park and stay without worry. We are also a convenient 5 minute walk to 3 different MBTA lines, the 66, 86, and 70. This allows easy access to Harvard Square, Central Square, and Brighton / Allston. The kitchen was renovated a few years ago, and has been able to accompany several pot luck dinners. We also have a backyard with patio furniture where we lay out after work and relax over a few beers.
We are also a 5 minute walk to the 66, 86, and 70, which allows easy access to Harvard, Central, and Brighton, which also gives you access to the Green and Red line!
The unit itself is owned by a real estate management company, so they take care of the property and needs. They mow the grass in the spring and summer, shovel the front walk in the winter, and even plow the driveway when there`s too much snow. They are also very reliable when it comes to fixing house essentials. Last October our water heater broke, and they came to check it the next morning and replaced it that day. Since they take care of the property, they expect us to do the same.
Rooms
---------
Both rooms are about the same size, 18` x 13` (it`s been a while since I measured), but the $900 room includes a walk in closet as opposed to a standard, 4` x 8` (again guesstimate) closet. The $860 room is available immediately, and the $900 room is available September 1st. Move in requires first month and deposit, which is the equivalent to first month`s rent.
Tenants
----------
I`m a 26 year old male currently working as a media project manager for a publishing company that probably ripped you off in college. I`m a huge fan of live music and make it a goal to see a live show at least once a week. I`m not the best chef, but I can follow online recipes at least. Toby is a film and theater major coming all the way from Denmark. Like me, he`s a big music enthusiast and is looking forward to experiencing the venues Boston has to offer. We already have plans to check out the Black Keys, with Cage the Elephant opening for them, this September. Finally, Kledio is 23 year old recent graduate working for a web advertising company. Also a big music buff, but more into the EDM scene.
What We`re Looking For
------------------------------
All 3 of us are very laid back and easy going. What we`re hoping for is to find people who would want to hang out with us after work and chill over a game of Cards Against Humanity or Scribblish when we have some spare time. Male or Female, Gay or Straight, Pets or no Pets, it all doesn`t matter to us. We`re just hoping for people who don`t want to lock themselves in their room 24/7 and would rather hang about with the house.
So if this seems to tickle your interest, send me a text / message. Due to time constraints, the rooms will be offered on a first come / first serve basis (first to give a check claims to room).
----------------------------------------------
TL&DR - Driveway, Washer, Dryer, Renovated Kitchen, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal, Backyard, Managed Unit, Plow Guy, Responsive Repair, Large Rooms, 4/20 Friendly, Music Enthusiasts, $860 - Now, $900 - Sept

About the apartment:
Large 2 bedroom 1 full bath for move in beginning of August.
Living room/dining room area, sectioned off kitchen.
Large windows, sunny apartment
2 parking spots, one for each person (not tandem parking)
$795/month + ultilities (~$25-30) = $818 to 823, $700 security deposit
Apt is in a friendly neighborhood close to the following:
10 min walking to Vons, Subway, Rite Aid, two gas stations, BOA ATM
15 min walking to Albertsons, Ross, Chase bank, Office Max
20 min walking to Culver downtown, Trader Joe`s, various restaurants and bars and Metro Expo line
1 min walking to Big Blue Bus stop no. 12 and 6 (Commuter bus to SMC)
3 min to I-10
About me:
I`m a 30 y/o asian female paralegal and work full-time. I have a set schedule and I usually work at least 5 days a week. I`m healthy and I enjoy cooking. I don`t drink nor smoke, and I don`t really have parties (sometimes friends over for dinner on a weekend, but very seldomly). I`m very focused on my career, but I`m also social and love my friends when I can see them. I`m pretty relaxed and usually in a good mood. If work is too stressful, I prefer to have a quiet weekend.
I`m very respectful, responsible, drama-free and courteous.
What I need from an apartment mate (either female or male):
I need you to either work FULL TIME or be a graduate student with a stable income. The landlord will ask for proof of income and two references from people you lived with or your former landlord and a credit check.
.
I need you to be clean. I`ve found that every person claims to be "clean," but everyone has a different definition. I am by no means a clean freak, but you have to be willing to do your part in taking out the trash, dusting, cleaning the bathroom .Please be a non-smoker and no pets either.
Please only serious inquiries and no attachments in your email. Emails with attachments will be deleted immediately. Don`t hesitate to email me with questions about the apartment and I look forward to hearing from you.

postings.body:
I have one week available in a One Bedroom Suite at the Via Del Arco in Cabo San Lucas from September 13th-20th. (Sat-Sat)
Regular price can be $400+ per night, so keep that in mind and make me an offer. I simply transfer the reservation into your name after Paypal payment is made.
I`ve stayed here twice and can say the rooms are spacious, they have the best staff, they have an awesome bar on a pirate ship that sits in the middle of their swimming pool, and the spa at 31,000 sqft (that`s not a typo) is INCREDIBLE.
One Bedroom Suite:
The 1-bedroom suite sleeps a maximum of 4 adults and is quite spacious at 1254 square feet (including 302 sq. ft. of private balcony with patio furniture). Other features include: 2 patio doors (one from bedroom & one from living room) and daily maid service.
• The master bedroom features a King bed, whirlpool Jacuzzi tub and separate shower; flat-screen satellite TV, double closets, double sinks, electronic safe, hair dryer and ceiling fan.
• The living area includes a full bath, queen Murphy bed, second bathroom (3/4 bath with shower), flat-screen satellite TV, CD and VCR player, entertainment center, dining area and ceiling fans.
• The kitchen comes fully equipped with stove top, full-size refrigerator, and deluxe microwave. Other amenities include: washer & dryer, iron & ironing board, blender, toaster, coffee/tea maker, dishwasher, high-speed Internet access and mini-bar.
Villa Del Arco:
Beach-front Location
The resort is located right on the pristine sands of El Medano Beach and has a magnificent panoramic view of "El Arco/Lands End".
The world-famous El Médano Beach (The Dune Beach) is the most popular and only swimmable beach in Cabo San Lucas. Yes, it is safe to swim here year round. It is an ocean though (Sea of Cortez) so check with the beach attendant or watch for the red flag before going in. Rarely do the waves get big enough for the red flags to go up. It`s the perfect place to relax. Food and beverage service is provided on the beach.
Yes, you really can swim at this beach!
Restaurants
The ocean front restaurant at Villa del Arco is El Patron, featuring Mexican cuisine, and is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
At El Faro (another ocean front location) you can enjoy oysters, sushi, pizza, tapas, and tequila while enjoying the view of El Arco (Land`s End).
The pirate-themed bar is The Buccaneer, a pirate ship anchored in one of the swimming pool areas. Its menu includes cocktails, burgers, sandwiches, wraps, tacos and ice cream.
The poolside taco bar (by day) and restaurant Americana (by night) is a casual and enjoyable alternative with poolside seating.
And room service always is available to serve guests.
The Desert Spa
The Desert Spa at Villa del Arco has many treatments and specialties available in the 3-level health Spa. (It contains 31,000 square feet of spa and fitness center.) A complete hydrotherapy center includes a giant Jacuzzi, body temperature pool, cold plunge pool, steam room, cold pressure showers, swiss showers and sauna. There are private jacuzzi`s and treatment areas, and a full-service beauty salon.
This expansive Spa is designed to give guests health, beauty, decompression and rejuvenation.
The hours of operation for the Spa are 8 am to 9 pm Monday through Saturday, and 8 am to 8 pm on Sunday.
The Fitness Center is open from 7 am to 9 pm Monday through Saturday, and 7 am to 8 pm on Sunday.
Villa del Arco guest activities
Resort guests are offered endless hours of action and water-sports such as horseback riding on the beach, wave-runners, parasailing, boat rides, boogie boards, kayaks, boat tours & more. Go on an ATV ride and tour the nearby sites.
Swimming pools and Jacuzzi hot tub
Villa del Arco has two large swimming pool areas surrounded by sun decks with lounge chairs and umbrellas. Relax near the cascading waterfalls, taking in the view of El Arco (Land`s End) and the beautiful bay. The main pool area has a full-size replica of a Spanish galleon anchored in it, where you can find The Buccaneer bar. Children enjoy playing in the fountains in the children`s pool area.

DESCRIPTION
~Upscale Balboa Bungalow~
Enjoy all the fun of an invigorating beach vacation in this upscale bungalow located on Newport Beach`s famed Balboa Peninsula. What was once a historical beach cottage has been transformed into a classy and upscale modern marvel - completely rebuilt and re-styled from top to bottom in 2011. The historic heritage of the original home shines through in many of the details, while the remodel also incorporates the finest-quality materials and workmanship. Exquisite custom fixtures and luxurious state-of-the-art modern conveniences can be found throughout. Designed around a unique multi-level floor plan, this charming vacation cottage offers 3 bedrooms, plus a den and two computer/sitting areas, plus 2-1/4 bathrooms. The Craftsman-style bungalow is an impressive 2,350 square feet and presents an elegant beach hideaway boasting imported stone, tile and granite as well as rich wood moldings and exceptional details. Splendid accommodations for a family, or a small group of 6-8. The Upscale Balboa Bungalow is located just a half-block off the beach, in the highly desirable upper Balboa peninsula-area. Even in the height of summer, the home is easy to get to and away from the traffic congestion that occurs further up on the Peninsula. Elegant designer furnishings and accessories are currently being selected for the home. Use your imagination to envision how this luxurious residence will welcome and comfort once completely equipped. With its ideal location and luxuriously appointed details, the benefits of a posh Newport Beach lifestyle can be yours while staying in this classy bungalow.
